text: int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int maxsum = 0 ; int n ; void recursive_sum ( int , int , int ) ; int main ( ) { int i , j , t , test ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; while ( test != 0 ) { maxsum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; t = 1 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < t ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; t ++ ; } recursive_sum ( 0 , 0 , arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , maxsum ) ; test -- ; } return 0 ; } void recursive_sum ( int i , int j , int sum ) { if ( i == n ) { if ( sum > maxsum ) maxsum = sum ; return ; } int x = arr [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; int y = arr [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; int sum1 = sum + x ; int sum2 = sum + y ; recursive_sum ( i + 1 , j , sum1 ) ; recursive_sum ( i + 1 , j + 1 , sum2 ) ; return ; }
